alert.note: Alert for San Diego County Mountains (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 15 at 2:22PM PST until January 16 at 10:00AM PST by NWS SanDiego
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM PST MONDAY... * WHAT...West winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts to 55 mph expected. Local gusts to 65 mph on the ridges and desert slopes of the San Diego County Mountains. * WHERE...San Diego County Mountains, Apple and Lucerne Valleys, Coachella Valley, San Diego County Deserts and San Gorgonio Pass Near Banning. * WHEN...Until 10 AM PST Monday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Hazardous travel for high profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Strong winds will continue into early Tuesday morning but will be part of the Winter Weather Advisory.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
